Summary: Large White Sphere or Round object
divs: Sighting DetailsI didn't know I had filmed it, I was walking near the old Army Post or Fort called Ft.Snelling. I was on the South end of the wall of the Fort. As I was walking away from the Fort towards the Mississippi River. I heard what sounded like a Loud Boom noise, like when they fire the cannons at the fort in the summer, the Fort is not open now. I comment in the video of the noise and pan towards the the North and the wall of the Fort. Later upon viewing the clip, you can see a large White Sphere or Circular object appear just after I mention the loud noise. It's around the 3:37 mark on the clip, I put a square around the area on the clip. I still have the original clip on my computer and my hard drive of my video camera.This occurred around 1:44 P.M and was on May 18th, 20010. When I view the object on the video it seems to materialize quickly and then fades away. Iv tried to submit the video file and a couple of still shots from the video. It doesn't submit, when I push the submit button with the video file and two pictures. It just processes and never submits?
trends: There have been 52 other sightings in Minneapolis
There were no other sightings in Minneapolis on or around May 18th 2010
